page.title: 09THE ALMSHOUSE, SHERBORNE.
page.content: The Almshouse stands on the South _ Western corner of the Abbey Close. It is open from 10:30 a.m to 12:30 p.m. Residents have to pay Â£32 but in August this is going up to Â£45 but this includes food. They have to make their own entertain _ment around the place but sometimes they go on trips and mystery tours, for e.g.they have just gone on a mystery tour to the New Forest. They have to be in by 10.00 at night but if they are going to stay out later they are given a key. Most people go there because they have no relatives. The place is only used as an old peoples home not a hospital but there is a Matron who looks after them and gives medical attention if they need it.
